description:
Gabunoji is the name that Louis gave his Gablias in the Japanese version. Louis` Garchomp can Mega Evolve into Mega Gablias in battle. Louis believes that Louis` Garchomp is quite impressive.
Louis` Garchomp had a fierce battle with Alan`s Charizard over a Mega Stone that Alan had just obtained. Despite being a Dragon trainer, Louis didn`t realize that Lizardon`s type changes to Dragon when in its Mega Evolved form. That error proved to be his downfall as he lost the Mega Evolved battle against Alan.
name: Gablias (Louis)
